# The filter extension

Configure the `filter` extension.

This extension provides support for data filtering.

## EXT_FILTER

* Default: `ON`
* Values: `ON|OFF`

Enable the extension.

## EXT_FILTER_SHARED

* Default: `OFF`
* Values: `ON|OFF`

Build extension as shared.
